description: Peterborough United says it will "take appropriate action" following the police investigation.
title: Fan arrested over alleged racial abuse during Peterborough game
title_page: Fan arrested over alleged racial abuse during Peterborough game - BBC News
maintext:
A football fan was arrested after a member of staff was reportedly racially abused during Peterborough United's home clash with Shrewsbury Town on Saturday.
The 23-year-old was detained on suspicion of a racially aggravated public order offence at about 15:15 GMT â€“ 15 minutes after the two sides kicked off in their League One match.
Peterborough United said the man, who is from the city, was arrested in the GH Display stand of the team's Weston Homes Stadium.
He was released on bail until 31 May.
